name: INAddMediaIntentResponse
desc: An intents handler's response to an add media intent.

items.name: init(code: INAddMediaIntentResponseCode, userActivity: NSUserActivity?)
items.desc: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

items.name: var code: INAddMediaIntentResponseCode
items.desc: A response code that indicates whether the app successfully added the media.

items.name: enum INAddMediaIntentResponseCode
items.desc: Codes returned by an app or Intents app extension when handling or confirming an add media intent.
